example.parse: (IP (CP-CND (ADVP (CS 一旦)) (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 寄身) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 物质))) (VP (VV 毁损)))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NN 资讯)) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (PP (P 随) (NP (PN 之))) (VP (VV 佚失))))
